title: A CRUISE TO DIE FOR
description: Deductive Logico was excited they were taking a cruise, but it turned out it was on a cargo ship in the Bermuda Triangle. When the first mate died, Irratino was ecstatic. Finally, proof of the paranormal!

suspects.name: MX. TANGERINE
suspects.description: Proving that non-binary people can be murderers, too, they are an artist, poet, and suspect.

suspects.name: ADMIRAL NAVY
suspects.description: The firstborn son of an Admiral Navy who himself was the firstborn son of an Admiral Navy.

suspects.name: CAPTAIN SLATE
suspects.description: A real-life astronaut. The first woman to travel around the dark side of the moon, and also the first to be suspected of murdering her copilot.

weapons.name: POISONED RUM
weapons.description: Yo ho ho and a bottle of arsenic.

weapons.name: A FLARE
weapons.description: You could shoot a flare into the sky or into somebody's head.

locations.name: THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
locations.description: Covered in posters of the captain's favorite waves.

locations.name: THE CARGO HOLD
locations.description: Millions of pounds of cargo, mostly cheap electronics and fast fashion.

locations.name: OVERBOARD
locations.description: Here you might get murdered by the sharks, too.

clues: Much to his embarrassment, Admiral Navy had to call for help when he went overboard.
The other person just as tall as Mx. Tangerine was seen playing with a flare.

statements.speaker: Mx. Tangerine
statements.statement: I was not in the cargo hold.

statements.speaker: Admiral Navy
statements.statement: A sailor's rope was in the captain's quarters.

statements.speaker: Captain Slate
statements.statement: What do you want me to say? I was in the captain's quarters.
